publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3225 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 3rd Report of the Finance Committee 2002-That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report 2002 of the Finance Committee, Stage 1 of the 2003/04 Budget Process (SP Paper 597) and refers the recommendations to the Scottish Executive for consideration.

S1M-3225 Des McNulty on behalf of the Finance Committee: 3rd Report of the Finance Committee 2002-That the Parliament notes the 3rd Report 2002 of the Finance Committee, Stage 1 of the 2003/04 Budget Process (SP Paper 597) and refers the recommendations to the Scottish Executive for consideration.
